actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 by repealing certain provisions enacted by the Tax Equity and Fiscal Responsibility Act of 1982 relating to the reporting by employers of tips in the cases of certain food and beverage establishments.
short_title: Repeal of Tip Reporting Act of 1983

summary.text: Repeal of Tip Reporting Act of 1983 - Repeals provisions of the Internal Revenue Code relating to the reporting by employers of tips in the case of certain food and beverage establishments.

titles.title: Repeal of Tip Reporting Act of 1983

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 by repealing certain provisions enacted by the Tax Equity and Fiscal Responsibility Act of 1982 relating to the reporting by employers of tips in the cases of certain food and beverage establishments.
